channel.title: Payment refund (paypal)
channel.description:
If someone clicks refund after sending me a payment, but I've already transferred it to my bank account and have no money left on my paypal account, what happens?
Paypal do not have permission to automatically withdraw the money from my bank account. Or at least I don't think they do..

item.title: Payment refund (paypal)
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:3, topic:325601”]if you have direct debit set up, theyll just take the money.

if you dont, your paypal goes into the red, you get banned from paypal and they threaten you with debt collectors (which personally i never got sent after me, but that doesnt mean it never happens)

“wed like to restore your access as quickly as possible”

lol, bs (its been 5 years)[/quote]How much did you owe?

Read full topic

item.title: Payment refund (paypal)
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

mines been owing $0.27 for years now, and they havent tried to hunt me down !!

Read full topic

item.title: Payment refund (paypal)
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Mine is locked also, I never owed any money or anything they just did it so I would get my Bank # correct but its a VERY old bank and I have totally forgotten what I put for almost everything on that account.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

they will bill your account i believe, if you close your account then they cant get the cash back but will try and pursue you for it i think
